text: Jailton dos Santos, known as Dinda (born 18 August 1972) is a former Brazilian football player. He played 8 seasons and 129 games (scoring 19 goals) in the Primeira Liga for União de Leiria and Marítimo. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for União de Leiria on 26 March 1995 as a late substitute in a 5–1 victory over Farense. ==References== ==External links== Category:1972 births Category:People from Ceará Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Clube Náutico Capibaribe players Category:Associação Desportiva Confiança players Category:Sport Club do Recife players Category:U.D.
